verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David בָּרֲכִ֣י <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all קְ֝רָבַ֗י <S%H7130><s%> ke-ra-Vai, and all that is within אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. me [bless] his holy

בָּרֲכִ֣י <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י <S%H7911><s%> tish-ke-Chi, and forget כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1576><s%> ge-mu-Lav. not all his benefits

הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ <S%H5545><s%> has-so-Le-ach Who forgiveth לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all עֲוֹנֵ֑כִי <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Ne-chi; all thine iniquities הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א <S%H7495><s%> ha-ro-Fe, who healeth לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ <S%H8463><s%> ta-cha-lu-'A-ye-chi. all thy diseases

הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> hag-go-'El Who redeemeth מִשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> mish-Sha-chat from destruction חַיָּ֑יְכִי <S%H2416><s%> chai-Ya-ye-chi; thy life הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי <S%H5849><s%> ham-'at-te-Re-chi, who crowneth חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed thee with lovingkindness וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <S%H7356><s%> ve-ra-cha-Mim. and tender mercies

הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע <S%H7646><s%> ham-mas-Bi-ya' Who satisfieth בַּטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> bat-Tov with good עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ <S%H5716><s%> 'ed-Yech; thy mouth תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H2318><s%> tit-chad-Desh is renewed כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> kan-Ne-sher like the eagle's נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ <S%H5271><s%> ne-'u-Ra-ye-chi. [things so that] thy youth

עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh executeth צְדָק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> tze-da-Kot righteousness יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tim, and judgment לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ <S%H6231><s%> 'a-shu-Kim. for all that are oppressed

יוֹדִ֣יעַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-Di-a' He made known דְּרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav his ways לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> le-mo-Sheh; unto Moses לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei unto the children יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> a-li-Lo-tav. his acts

רַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> ra-Chum [is] merciful וְחַנּ֣וּן <S%H2587><s%> ve-chan-Nun and gracious יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD אֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> 'E-rech slow אַפַּ֣יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and plenteous חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed. in mercy

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor לָנֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach He will not always יָרִ֑יב <S%H7378><s%> ya-Riv; chide וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [his anger] for ever יִטּֽוֹר׃ <S%H5201><s%> yit-Tor. neither will he keep

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ <S%H2399><s%> Cha-cha-ta-'ei-nu with us after our sins עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah He hath not dealt לָ֑נוּ La-nu; וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor כַ֝עֲוֹנֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> cha-'a-vo-no-Tei-nu, us according to our iniquities גָּמַ֥ל <S%H1580><s%> ga-Mal nor rewarded עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu. and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki as כִגְבֹ֣הַּ <S%H1361><s%> chig-Vo-ah is high above שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> ma-yim For as the heaven עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are above הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the earth גָּבַ֥ר <S%H1396><s%> ga-Var [so] great חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do, is his mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- toward יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av. toward them that fear

כִּרְחֹ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> kir-Chok As far as מִ֭זְרָח <S%H4217><s%> Miz-roch the east מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> mi-ma-'a-Rav; is from the west הִֽרְחִ֥יק <S%H7368><s%> hir-Chik [so] far hath he removed מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6588><s%> pe-sha-'Ei-nu. our transgressions

כְּרַחֵ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> ke-ra-Chem pitieth אָ֭ב <S%H1><s%> 'av Like as a father עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; [his] children רִחַ֥ם <S%H7355><s%> ri-Cham pitieth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [so] the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av. them that fear

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu Himself יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' For he knoweth יִצְרֵ֑נוּ <S%H3336><s%> yitz-Re-nu; our frame זָ֝כ֗וּר <S%H2142><s%> za-Chur, he remembereth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far that we [are] dust אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu. ourselves

אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> 'E-noosh are like כֶּחָצִ֣יר <S%H2682><s%> ke-cha-Tzir [are] as grass יָמָ֑יו <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mav; his days כְּצִ֥יץ <S%H6731><s%> ke-Tzitz as a flower הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, of the field כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יָצִֽיץ׃ <S%H6692><s%> ya-Tzitz. so he flourisheth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki When ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach For the wind עָֽבְרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-rah- passeth over בּ֣וֹ bo וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ei-Nen-nu; is no וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5234><s%> yak-ki-Ren-nu thereof shall know ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> me-ko-Mo. it and it is gone and the place

וְחֶ֤סֶד <S%H2617><s%> ve-Che-sed But the mercy יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> me-'o-Lam [is] from everlasting וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- to ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> o-lom everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av; upon them that fear וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-To, him and his righteousness לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei unto children's בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim. children

לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> le-sho-me-Rei To such as keep בְרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-To; his covenant וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י <S%H2142><s%> u-le-zo-che-Rei and to those that remember פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו <S%H6490><s%> fik-ku-Dav, his commandments לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-so-Tam. to do

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Bash-sha-ma-yim in the heavens הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> he-Chin hath prepared כִּסְא֑וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O; his throne וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ <S%H4438><s%> u-mal-chu-To, and his kingdom בַּכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> bak-Kol all מָשָֽׁלָה׃ <S%H4910><s%> ma-Sha-lah. ruleth

בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו <S%H4397><s%> mal-'A-Chav ye his angels גִּבֹּ֣רֵי <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bo-rei that excel כֹ֭חַ <S%H3581><s%> Cho-ach in strength עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei that do דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro; his commandments לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a', hearkening בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol unto the voice דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro. of his word

בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all צְבָאָ֑יו <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Av; all [ye] his hosts מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tav, [ye] ministers עֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei of his that do רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> re-tzo-No. his pleasure

בָּרֲכ֤וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all מַעֲשָׂ֗יו <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav, all his works בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מְקֹמ֥וֹת <S%H4725><s%> me-ko-Mot in all places מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4475><s%> mem-shal-To; of his dominion בָּרֲכִ֥י <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chi bless נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD
